channel.title: News page broken
channel.description:
So, after the recent front page redesign, the News section doesn't work properly. [url]https://www.blackmesasource.com/news.html[/url]
You can read the first page just fine, but when you try to switch pages on the bottom of the page, it throws you back to the new front page.
I just wanted to read all the old news just to see how the mod's progress has been over the times.

item.title: News page broken
item.dc:creator: Hubicorn
item.description:
Matoking:

So, after the recent front page redesign, the News section doesn’t work properly.
https://www.blackmesasource.com/news.html

You can read the first page just fine, but when you try to switch pages on the bottom of the page, it throws you back to the new front page.

I just wanted to read all the old news just to see how the mod’s progress has been over the times.

thank you for letting me know. I shall have this taken care of.

Read full topic

item.title: News page broken
item.dc:creator: ManlyStump
item.description:
Tinman:

No

Well, you’re clearly an authority on the subject. Considering how late in the year it has gotten, and the frequency with which the news page gets updated, I should think the next news update would either be the release (date), or an apology that they haven’t made it in time!

Read full topic

item.title: News page broken
item.dc:creator: Tinman
item.description:
daventry:

or will the next thing be the Release Date.

No

Read full topic

item.title: News page broken

item.description:
When can we expect something New, or will the next thing be the Release Date.
